attributes.action: Ban marriages with an age gap of 10 or more years unless both are at least 21.
attributes.additional_details: Consider this case UK Physics Teacher went abroad to marry a 13 year old child bride http://articlewiz.co.uk/uk-physics-teacher-went-abroad-to-marry-a-13-year-old-child-bride/?fbclid=IwAR1HZqWStC1u0Eli_mhsD7HgpIZdgHLWFvTw0QKsU1rWHt86upHFD-192zE
attributes.background: Consider the case of a 34 year old UK Physics Teacher went abroad to marry a 13 year old child bride. There are many such cases like this.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We understand that you’re concerned about child marriages, but this marriage took place overseas and would not be covered by UK legislation.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, if you’d like the legal minimum age for marriage to be increased, you could start a petition asking for that. 

You can find out about the current laws on marriage here: 

https://www.gov.uk/marriages-civil-partnerships
